ED_Title: Report of the International Residual Mechanism for Criminal Tribunals
ED_DecisionText: At its 17th plenary meeting, on 21 October 2020, the General Assembly took note of the eighth annual report of the International Residual Mechanism for Criminal Tribunals (A/75/276-S/2020/763).
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
